divs: Sighting DetailsOut side, 4 nights in a row now. Look like stars, then see movement, in every fashion. I knew it was a ufo, have seen several since moving here last October. Object, appears as a star. then moves around, up, down, back, forth, diagonal, circular. goes & stops on a dime. The first time, I wondered if my eyes were playing tricks on me. But, I quickly realized what I was seeing. This isn't the first time. So, I feel thrilled & happy. Don't want to take my eyes off of them. I lose sight when either moring comes, or I fall asleep. They move with the stars. Keep a general position.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Souderton
There were no other sightings in Souderton on or around February 18th 2012
